cancellation_reason: Superseded by 0015-attachment-point-spreading, which is based on deeper research (research 0009) into how dagre/mermaid handle attachment spreading.
last_session_notes: Created baseline test fixtures and documented current collision behavior in baseline-renders.md. Key fixtures: stacked_fan_in.mmd (hidden edge), skip_edge_collision.mmd (overlap), double_skip.mmd (stacking). Ready to begin Phase 1 implementation.
